question_text: Which of the following statements are true about mobile hotspots and carrier controls? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Some carriers require additional fees for hotspot use
Hotspot traffic may be metered separately from phone usage
USB tethering requires the phone to broadcast an SSID
Not all data plans include hotspot access by default
correct_answer: Some carriers require additional fees for hotspot use
Hotspot traffic may be metered separately from phone usage
Not all data plans include hotspot access by default
explanation: Carriers may impose charges, metering, or restrictions on hotspot use. USB tethering is a wired method and does not require Wi-Fi broadcasting.
